name: Numtastic
description:
If we all can agree on one thing, it is that numbers a great. Numbers numbers numbers. What more can I say? Honestly... I wont say anymore

Instructions: Click + numbers before they fall out of the screen. If a positive number manages to escape, you will lose a life but watch out! Negative numbers are here to haunt you. They will hurt you if touched... I recommend leaving them be.

Use the options menu (Escape) to access your stash and the shop. Your stash will stay with you after losing a game so make sure to unlock that cool particle you wanted before you die! (or just don't die)

Controls: 

Mouse1.... Use it

Escape - Opens up the main menu. Also used to close menus

Krassjam Theme: A game where you touch numbers to buy virtual items

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for #Krassjam5 July2018

This game was made within less than 24 hours. Expect weak gameplay and missing features such as progress being saved when exiting the game.

Noticeable bugs: Certain options menu buttons wants to become someone else. Hitting a button might not take you to the right place. Also "hitboxes" seem a little weird sometimes
